title: kAdal nOi
sahitya:
kAdal nOi iduvAgum endan kandanaik-kaNDapin tAn adu pOghum


anupallavi

  nAthan avanai veghu nALAgak-kANAda vEdanait-tApam mighum sOdanaiyAl vanda


caraNam 1    aru suvai uNavai oru siru aLavum arundap-piDikkAda veruppaik-koDuttu
iravil panjaNaiyil urangak-konjamum iyalAmal endan tuyilaik-keDukkum
    caraNam 2    muttu pavazha navaratna mAlaigaL mettap-paghaTTuLLa men paTTADaigaL
ettanaiyO vaghai Enaiya bhOgangaL attanaiyum verukkum pittinaip-perukkum
